    public class ServerChatUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements Accessible
    This class is to connect the server with the socket

    1.8.0_181

    1.0
    Author:
    Seongyeop Jeong(040885882), John dobie(040659609)

      • runClient

        private void runClient()
        this method is to initializes the object of the ConnectionWrapper with socket. then it will take the connection to create streams so that it will initialize the outputStream filed. so then it creates an runnable object by using the ChatRunnable class, and constructor this will create the thread by passing the runnable reference, then it will make them all with the constructor, and will starts the thread

      • createUI

        public javax.swing.JPanel createUI()
        This method is to create the graphic user interface for the server chat
        Returns:
        mainPanel it is for the server chat GUI
